R

redo() - Method in class controller.Controller
Redo's a user move on the board.
redoBoard - Variable in class controller.Controller
 
redoButton - Variable in class view.View
JMenu Title to redo an user-command
redoMoney - Variable in class controller.Controller
 
removeUpdate() - Method in class controller.Controller
It will remove pieces when health is equal to zero and below.
repeater - Variable in class test.RepeaterTest
The Repeater Piece Object that is analysed
repeater - Variable in class view.View
A Repeater option on the pop-up menu
Repeater - Class in model
The Repeater class provides the PlantsVSZombie game with a single Piece type that once called can create a Repeater Piece in of itself.
Repeater() - Constructor for class model.Repeater
Creates a Repeater with 5 health, 4 attack damage with 40 cost value.
Repeater(String, char, int, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Repeater
 
RepeaterTest - Class in test
The Test Class for the REPEATER (Piece SubClass)
RepeaterTest() - Constructor for class test.RepeaterTest
 
reset() - Method in class controller.Controller
Will re-initialize the gameboard, where no piece has spawned.
restartLevels() - Method in class model.GameLevels
The method is used to restart the levels during the game reset
row - Variable in class model.Coordinate
The Row value of the coordinate
runTime() - Method in class controller.Controller
This method is used to call the other methods required to finish a turn, after the player has placed his/her plants.
